entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. A few showers beginning this morning. Snow level 1400 metres rising to 1700 metres this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to 1400 metres near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
